thread.section_title: Mazuma Mobile Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mazuma Mobile Australia | mazumamobile.com.au
thread.title: Christopher Thompson
thread.title_full: Mazuma Mobile Australia reviewed by Christopher Thompson

author: Christopher Thompson
title: Christopher Thompson
text: I sold my iPad to Mazuma for $80. Although this was more than Apple offered and far less than what I paid for it in 2011. I had no further use for it and reduced my outlay to purchase a new iPad Pro. Mazuma provided a prepaid package to me for free first. My only advice is to make sure you add some additional packing material to ensure your item arrives in good order. The credit to my account happened almost instantly. I would recommend.
